mapper.sql: id, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name
mapper.select: select id from address order by id asc limit 1;
mapper.insert:
insert into address
province_code,
province_name,
city_code,
city_name,
district_code,
district_name,

mapper.update:
update address
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update address set province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
